description: To promote teamwork efforts and escape from the usual routine, we held another “Virtual Escape Room” activity this month. It was fun solving the puzzle together and connecting with our teammates in small groups!

Since our pugs are stuck at home sheltering in place, they wanted to introduce you to their work pal's pups! Meet Barbara’s new puppy Naya. She is 4 months old, has tons of energy and wants to play all day!
